DOC.brief_summary: Multicentric , observational , retrospective registry include patient underwent implantable device implantation ( pacemaker ICD ) indication period 2009 2016 , follow remote monitoring . The aim registry evaluate occurrence atrial arrhythmia , hospitalization , mortality long-term follow-up .
